mapper.update: update payment_type set pay_chan_code = #{payChanCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_type_Code = #{payTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_type_name = #{payTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
